backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko backend actor with no methods or state defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the Firebase stub/mock localhost authorization feature to its implementation file and test ID REQ-50.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file for the Zweeti Fast Food Billing app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file that defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Zweeti Fast Food Billing app, loading Nunito fonts from Google Fonts and mounting the React app at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component implementing Firebase OTP phone authentication (pre-filled with test credentials), billing item management, GST toggle, daily sales tracking, and date-wise sales report.
frontend/src/components/BillingForm.tsx: Billing form component with a 13-item Zweeti menu selector, quantity input, and an Add Item button that calls the parent's onAddItem callback.
frontend/src/components/BillSummary.tsx: Bill summary component rendering a two-column item/price table with subtotal, GST breakdown, and a grand total tfoot row, plus per-item remove buttons.
frontend/src/firebase.ts: Firebase Auth stub that mirrors the real SDK's RecaptchaVerifier, signInWithPhoneNumber, and ConfirmationResult API, permissively allowing all domains (including localhost and 127.0.0.1) without throwing unauthorized-domain errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient, exposing identity, login/clear functions, and login status.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/components/utilities plus custom ZWEETI Pro brand CSS variables and component classes (buttons, cards, table styles, header) using an orange/green/blue color scheme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with ZWEETI brand colors, Nunito font, OKLCH-based semantic color tokens, custom border radii, and plugins for animation, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 63) documenting the Zweeti Fast Food Billing app's architecture, existing features, known issues, and design decisions including Firebase OTP auth, GST toggle, and print-to-PDF functionality.
